mapper.update: UPDATE SET last_amount=#{amount},meter_updated_at= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{time}/1000) WHERE uuid = #{uuid};
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS room_id,gb.smart_gateway_id,w.smart_watermeter_id,w.uuid,r.name AS room_name,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,"栋",h.unit_num,"单元",h.house_num) AS house_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status,g.sn FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id INNER JOIN AS g ON g.smart_gateway_id = gb.smart_gateway_id INNER JOIN AS h ON w.house_id= h.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND h.id=r.house_id AND r.created_by_id = #{id} ;
SELECT g.smart_gateway_id,g.uuid,a.name AS house_name,g.room_id,g.updated_at,g.created_at,g.brand FROM g LEFT JOIN AS a ON g.apartment_id =a.id WHERE smart_gateway_id = #{id};

SELECT g.smart_gateway_id,g.uuid,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,"栋",h.unit_num,"单元",h.house_num) AS house_name,g.room_id,g.updated_at,g.created_at,g.brand FROM g LEFT JOIN AS h ON g.house_id =h.id WHERE smart_gateway_id = #{id};

SELECT gb.smart_gateway_id,w.smart_watermeter_id,r.name AS room_name,h.floor_num,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,"栋",h.unit_num,"单元",h.house_num) AS house_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id AND gb.smart_gateway_id = #{id} INNER JOIN AS h ON w.house_id= h.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND h.id=r.house_id;

SELECT gb.smart_gateway_id,w.uuid,w.smart_watermeter_id,r.name AS room_name,h.floor_num,h.name AS house_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id AND gb.smart_gateway_id = #{id} INNER JOIN AS h ON w.apartment_id= h.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND h.id=r.apartment_id;

SELECT r.id AS room_id,w.uuid,a.name AS house_name,gb.smart_gateway_id,w.smart_watermeter_id,r.name AS room_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status,g.sn FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id INNER JOIN AS g ON g.smart_gateway_id = gb.smart_gateway_id INNER JOIN AS f ON w.floor_id= f.id LEFT JOIN AS a ON w.apartment_id= a.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND f.id=r.floor_id AND f.id = #{id} ;

SELECT g.smart_gateway_id,a.name AS house_name,g.uuid,g.onoff_status, COUNT(DISTINCT gb.smart_id) AS watermeter_num,SUM(CASE w.onoff_status WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS watermeter_on_line_num FROM AS g LEFT JOIN AS gb ON g.smart_gateway_id=gb.smart_gateway_id LEFT JOIN AS w ON w.smart_watermeter_id=gb.smart_id LEFT JOIN AS a ON g.apartment_id =a.id WHERE g.apartment_id = #{id} GROUP BY g.smart_gateway_id;
SELECT wr.created_at,wr.device_amount,wr.smart_watermeter_id FROM wr WHERE smart_watermeter_id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT wr.created_at,wr.device_amount,wr.smart_watermeter_id FROM wr WHERE smart_watermeter_id = #{id} AND created_at between ADDDATE(#{startTime},-1) and #{endTime} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT e.created_at,e.exception_type FROM e, w WHERE e.uuid = w.uuid AND w.smart_watermeter_id = #{id}
SELECT e.created_at,e.exception_type FROM e, g WHERE e.uuid = g.uuid AND g.smart_gateway_id = #{id}
SELECT watermeter.uuid,watermeter.manufactory FROM watermeter WHERE watermeter.smart_watermeter_id = #{id}
SELECT house.created_by_id FROM house WHERE house.id = #{id}
SELECT apartment.created_by FROM apartment WHERE apartment.id = #{id}
SELECT smart_watermeter_id FROM smart_watermeter WHERE smart_watermeter.uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT (last_amount-meter_amount) AS amount FROM smart_watermeter WHERE smart_watermeter.smart_watermeter_id = #{watermenterId}
SELECT uuid,manufactory FROM
SELECT meter_updated_at FROM WHERE uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT g.smart_gateway_id,g.uuid, COUNT(DISTINCT gb.smart_id) AS watermeter_num,SUM(case w.onoff_status when 1 then 1 else 0 end) AS watermeter_onoff_num FROM AS g LEFT JOIN AS gb ON g.smart_gateway_id=gb.smart_gateway_id LEFT JOIN AS w ON w.smart_watermeter_id=gb.smart_id WHERE g.created_by = #{id} AND g.house_catalog = 1 GROUP BY g.smart_gateway_id;
SELECT onoff_status FROM WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT smart_watermeter_id FROM
SELECT device_amount FROM WHERE TO_DAYS(created_at) =TO_DAYS(last_day(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month))) AND smart_watermeter_id = #{watermeterId}

SELECT watermeter.uuid FROM AS gateway INNER JOIN AS bind ON gateway.smart_gateway_id=bind.smart_gateway_id INNER JOIN AS watermeter ON bind.smart_id=watermeter.smart_watermeter_id WHERE gateway.uuid=#{uuid}

SELECT DISTINCT a.id,a.name, 'apartment' AS `type` FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d JOIN `volga_test`.room r ON d.room_ID = r.id JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON r.apartment_id = a.id WHERE d.created_by = #{userId} AND d.room_ID > 0 AND d.brand = #{brand} AND d.house_catalog = 0 AND d.smart_device_type IN (2,5) UNION SELECT DISTINCT a.id,a.name, 'apartment' AS `type` FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d JOIN narcissus_test.public_zone p ON d.public_zone_ID = p.public_zone_ID JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON a.id = p.parent_ID WHERE d.created_by = #{userId} AND d.public_zone_ID > 0 AND d.brand = #{brand} AND p.data_type = 1 AND d.smart_device_type IN (2,5)

SELECT a.id,a.`name`,f.id AS floorId,f.`name` AS floorName,COUNT(d.smart_device_ID) AS watermeterNum,SUM(w.onoff_status) AS watermeterOnLineNum FROM `volga_test`.apartment AS a LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.floor AS f ON f.apartment_id = a.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room AS r ON r.floor_id = f.id LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 AS d ON d.room_ID = r.id AND d.smart_device_type = 2 LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_watermeter AS w ON w.smart_watermeter_id = d.smart_device_ID WHERE a.id = #{apartmentId} GROUP BY f.id

SELECT r.id AS roomId,r.name AS roomName,d.smart_device_ID AS waterId,w.meter_type,w.updated_at AS updateAt,w.last_amount,w.onoff_status FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_watermeter w ON d.smart_device_ID = w.smart_watermeter_id JOIN volga_test.room r ON r.id = d.room_ID JOIN volga_test.floor f ON f.id = r.floor_id WHERE f.id = #{floorId} AND d.smart_device_type = 2
